Description.Text: The Caswell Hotel is a small and idyllic value budget hotel near Victoria Station situated in the heart of Westminster, one of central London's most prestigious areas. When visiting London, location is everything and the Ca-swell Hotel offers easy access to some of the capital's greatest attractions, such as Buckingham Palace, Big Ben, Houses of Parliament and the Tate Gallery, London Eye, Hyde park Corner. The hotel offers a range of affordable rooms of varying facilities and sizes.The main thing about this hotel is location. Easy walking to every where in Central london. Also 8 Minute walk from Victoria Coach Station which is also known for cheap travel link. Its perfectly located for Gatwick Express, Stan-stead or Heath-row Airport Travelers. All prices include a Full Continental Breakfast and VAT (tax). Hotel also based for Cheap Bed and Breakfast hotels in London Victoria.

The Caswell Hotel is a small and idyllic value budget hotel near Victoria Station situated in the heart of Westminster, one of central London's most prestigious areas. When visiting London, location is everything and the Caswell Hotel offers easy access to some of the capital's greatest attractions, such as Buckingham Palace, Big Ben, Houses of Parliament and the Tate Gallery, London Eye, Hyde park Corner.

Single Room - Single Room with twin bed includes 24 hour Reception Service FREE WIFI CONNECTION 24 hour Internet access in the Lounge (1.00 for half an hour) All Non- smoking rooms. Arrange taxis and airport transfers. Iron/ironing boards Postcards and a postage service Alarm-wake up Services Televison and Hairdryers.
Twin Room - Twin Room with two twin beds includes 24 hour Reception Service FREE WIFI CONNECTION 24 hour Internet access in the Lounge (1.00 for half an hour) All Non- smoking rooms. Arrange taxis and airport transfers. Iron/ironing boards Postcards and a postage service Alarm-wake up Services Televison and Hairdryers.
Double Room - Double Room with double room includes 24 hour Reception Service FREE WIFI CONNECTION 24 hour Internet access in the Lounge (1.00 for half an hour) All Non- smoking rooms. Arrange taxis and airport transfers. Iron/ironing boards Postcards and a postage service Alarm-wake up Services Televison and Hairdryers.
